forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 52. South southwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the dawn unfurls its subtle hues over Downtown San Francisco, a serene clarity prevails in the air. The forecast whispers of a calm overnight retreat, with temperatures gently resting around fifty-two degrees, hinting at the comfort of a light sweater. With Wednesday's promise of a sunny embrace, temperatures will ascend close to sixty-seven and gracefully fall to sixty-four—a perfect backdrop for urban exploration as a soft breeze from the southwest carries the day's warmth, traversing the streets and parks.

While shadows of fog may still linger in the early hours, they are on the wane, allowing the iconic skyline and the distant outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge to emerge more distinctly with every passing moment. It is an inviting day that calls to the wanderers and the daydreamers alike. Perhaps a visit to one of the lush green parks for a quiet moment with a book, or a stroll along the waterfront to savor the gentle lapping of the bay, would be in order. The allure of a leisurely lunch at a local café, nestled among the architecture, could awaken the senses and complement the day’s unfolding charm. Dress in layers to navigate the cool morning air that will gradually yield to the gentle warmth as the sun asserts its presence, inviting you to embrace the day with a spirit of adventure.
